#summary The <game> Tag

= Introduction =

The `<game>` tag identifies which game this character sheet is for.


= Details =

Every Nerdcules character sheet must have exactly one `<game>` tag, which must appear inside the [TagHead <head>] tag. It is the second tag in sequence, appearing after the optional [TagSystem <system>] tag.

== Example ==

Please see the [TagHead <head>] tag for an example.
